original_text: And Moses and Eleazar the priest took the gold of the captains of thousands and of hundreds, and brought it into the tabernacle of the congregation, for a memorial for the children of Israel before the Lord.
korean_text: 모세와 제사장 엘르아살이 천부장과 백부장들에게서 금을 취하여 회막에 드려 여호와 앞에서 이스라엘 자손의 기념을 삼았더라

sentences.original_text: And Moses and Eleazar the priest
took the gold of the captains of thousands and of hundreds
and brought it into the tabernacle of the congregation
for a memorial for the children of Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 이스라엘 자손을 위한 기념이 되게 하려 함이며
